text: Thomas J. Pelphrey (born July 28, 1982) is an American actor. He is known for playing the TV roles of Jonathan Randall in CBS's Guiding Light (2004–2009), Mick Dante in As the World Turns (2009–2010) and Kurt Bunker in the Cinemax series Banshee (2015–2016). He has also acted in the Netflix shows Iron Fist (2017–2018) and Ozark (2020). He has won the Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Younger Actor in a Drama Series twice for Guiding Light in 2006 and 2008. Pelphrey was born in Howell, New Jersey. He graduated from Rutgers University in 2004. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Rutgers University alumni
title: Tom Pelphrey
